```{r}
library(ape)
library(caper)

tree1 <- read.tree(text = "((A, B), (C, D));")
plot(tree1, edge.width = 2)
```

```{r}
data <- here::here("data", "toy_data.csv") %>%
  read.csv(row.names = 1)
data1 <- data %>%
  select(ID, visit, species, y) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = species,
              values_from = y) %>%
  unite("id_time", c(ID, visit), sep = "_") %>%
  column_to_rownames("id_time")
```

```{r}
Trinfo <- treeinfo(tree1)
str(Trinfo)

## change the data into cluster
## each matrix contain the interior knot
## as well as its children
Ymat <- Ytree(Y = data1, 
              treeinf = Trinfo)
Ymat
```
